abilities.name: MASTERS OF TRADE
abilities.description: You do not have to spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the "Trade" strategy card.

abilities.name: GUILD SHIPS
abilities.description: You can negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbor.

abilities.name: ARBITERS
abilities.description: When you are negotiating a transaction, action cards can be exchanged as part of that transaction.

flagship.name: Wrath of Kenara
abilities: After you roll a die during space combat in this system, you may spend 1 trade good to apply +1 to the result.

base.name: Trade Convoys
base.effect: ACTION: Replenish your commodities. Then, place this card face up in your play area. While this card is face up in your play area, when you replenish commodities, you must give the Hacan player 1 of your commodities from your commodities value, if able.
base.returnCondition: If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Hacan player's units, return this card to the Hacan player.

base.name: Carth of Golden Sands
base.ability: During the action phase: You may exhaust this card to gain 2 commodities or replenish another player's commodities.

base.name: Gila the Silvertongue
base.ability: When you cast votes, you may spend any number of Trade Goods; cast 2 additional votes for each trade good spent.

base.name: Harrugh Gefhara
base.ability: When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION: You may reduce the cost of each of your units to 0 during this use of PRODUCTION. If you do, purge this card.
